name: NetLimit
tagline: NetLimit is a small tool to simulate a slow internet connection.
body:
### What do NetLimit
You can test your webapp with a EDGE, 3G or LTE connection on your mac. The optimization of the charge time is an important factor for webapps. Simply with NetLimit!

### It's free!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
